column5: The other day I was caught up in a thread and posted the wrong information. Retire55 was good enough to post a government link that clarified the issue. Regardless of how many times we make the trip mistakes can happen. Here is the Customs menu page that will answer most of the questions any of us might have. I suggest you folks save it to your favorites and keep it handy for future reference.http://www.ccra-adrc.gc.ca/customs/i...ls/menu-e.html
